means.word_mean: 1. Russian writer of plays and novels and short stories; noted for his depiction of social outcasts
2. an industrial city in the European part of Russia; birthplace of Maksim Gorky

auth_sentence.content: You gave me the gift of life, and I wish you could be here to enjoy it with me, said Nicholas Gorki.
